etomica.atom

Class AtomTypeAgentManager<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.atom.AtomTypeAgentManager<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulationListener

    public final class AtomTypeAgentManager<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimulationListener
    AtomTypeAgentManager acts on behalf of client classes (an AgentSource) to manage agents for every AtomType in a box. When species are added or removed from the simulation, the agents map is updated.

    This class should only be used instead of a Map when the SimulationListener functionality is required. That is, when the map needs to be kept up-to-date with every AtomType and an object provided by the AgentSource.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  AtomTypeAgentManager.AgentSource<E>
      Interface for an object that wants an agent associated with each AtomType in a Simulation.

    • Method Detail

      • getAgents

        public IndexMap<E> getAgents()

      • setAgent

        public void setAgent(AtomType atomType,
                     E newAgent)
        Sets the agent associated with the given atom type to be the given agent. The AtomType must be from the Simulation. The AtomType's old agent is not "released". This should be done manually if needed.

      • getAgent

        public E getAgent(AtomType type)
        Convenience method to return the agent the given AtomType. For repeated access to the agents from multiple AtomTypes, it might be faster to use the above getAgents method.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Unregisters this class as a listener for AtomType-related events and releases its agents.
